course_title: Fresh Sem: Africn Amer Studies: What Do You Know About Africa?
class_notes:
(Same as HIST 190 6, AFS 190 1)
This seminar will work to assess, problematize, and debunk myths and misperceptions while introducing students to scholarly works and visual images that will complicate how we discuss and understand Africa and Africans. As often as possible, music and other audio clips, documentaries, and film clips will be utilized to provide additional insights and perspectives.
course_description: Variable topics in African American Studies.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1930, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: W. Rucker, Status: Closed
